content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, it's a pleasure to meet you. I am sure you will find my apartment in the heart of München to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the price for this beautiful, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment. What is your budget for rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the offer of this newly built apartment in the city center. It's a great location, close to all the important facilities. Regarding the rent, I am looking to pay a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment and the location. Could you please tell me your starting price for the rent?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Haoyu Wang. I understand that you are looking for a fair price. To start the negotiations, I am willing to offer the apartment for €1,200 per month. This is a competitive price for the area, considering the modernity of the building and the central location. Would you be willing to pay this amount for the apartment?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your starting price of €1,200 per month is quite high for an unfurnished apartment, even though the location is excellent. I am looking to pay closer to €900 per month, which I believe is a more reasonable amount for an unfurnished space. Could we negotiate on this price?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I understand your perspective, Haoyu Wang, and I am willing to negotiate. However, €900 per month is much lower than my initial offer. Could you consider increasing your offer to €1,050 per month? This would be a fair compromise between your budget and my asking price. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Your counteroffer of €1,050 per month is more aligned with my expectations. I am willing to accept this price for the apartment. 'I agree to the price of €1,050 Euro!' Let's proceed with the lease agreement.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Excellent news, Haoyu Wang! I am very pleased to hear that you agree to the price of €1,050 per month. This is a fair agreement that reflects the value of the apartment. 'I agree to the price of €1,050 Euro!' Let's move forward with the lease agreement. If you have any other questions or need more time to review the terms, please let me know. Otherwise, we can proceed with the paperwork.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am ready to proceed with the lease agreement. I believe we have reached a fair deal, and I am looking forward to signing the lease. 'TERMINATE' the negotiation and kindly provide me with the necessary documents to finalize the lease.
name: Haoyu Wang from China
